Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Qhurayshi koros itta essertam maatiyaay
Itta essertam naba xaagu. (woh qhuraan kee sooloh ayró)
Woh usun itta elle waan xaagu
Wonna hinnay aaxigelon
Tohuk lakal digga luk, aaxigelon
Baaxó fidó siinih maabinninoo
Kaadu qaleelá kadeeditte (xiikol) maabinninoo baaxoh
Kaadu namma qaynatah sin ma gininnoo? (labim kee sayiimih anuk)
Kaadu sin xin sin xagarih raacat (rofto) maabinninoo
Kaadu bar sartan ma abinninoo? (kay ditet)
Kaadu laqó quusi edde gurrussan wakti siinih maabinninoo
Kaadu digga le malciin sin amol maxisinninoo? (malcina qaran kinnuk)
Kaadu ayro ifoytay hadiidigay cuumi le maabinninoo
Kaadu qamburrek taraaracinta lee moobisinninoo
Amboo kee baaxók ubukku ittam teetit nayyaaquh
Kaadu garoobuy gaabuh yani. (bustanwa kinnuk)
Diggah, baxsi ayroy ginô fan edde baxsaana yimixxige wakti yekke. (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Baanta fuxsinta ayró butta buttah anuk tamaaten. (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Kaadu qaran fakkiimaah, afoofi yakke ayró malaykah obtih
Kaadu qaleelá gexsimtaah edde bakarbakar takke
Digga luk jahannam girá woo saaku koroosite mara aracal qambalta gira tekke
Is caddok taturleelah elle gaceyná tekke.( koros kinnuk)
Usun Tet addal amurruqe wayta liggiditte daffeya maráh anuk
Tet addal xabcaay, aqubbu haanam matammoysan
Nabam niqni lee kee girâ marih qasaalayi akke waytek
Tamah keenih taguude galtó kinni. (ken uma taamák gexaak)
Diggah, usun fokkaaqok (cisaabak) meesitak suge weenimih sabbatah
Kaadu ni aayoota dirabboysiyyah dirabboyseenimih sabbatah
Ummaanim nesketteh (gaabosneh) kutbeh lawcal macfuuzul
Toysa Tammoysa! Siinih osisnam mannu digaalák sa keenik iyyan
Diggah Yallak meesita mari asallam le.(limayeenih)
Basaatin (masno) kee qinab lon
Kaadu kaqoona ley fooduh tani lon.(inki qumri le lon)
Kaadu galoosay gocoyuk kibuk tani lon
Kay addal deedal maxcoo kee dirabboysiyyak tu mayaabban
Tamah ku Rabbik galtoo kee acway dudda le kinni
Qaranwaa kee baaxooy, ken nammayih fanal enni ittaamih Rabbiy fulte Racmatta le.Kaâ luk yaabaanamih dudda lem matana
Jibriil kee malayka saffih gacca ittah solta ayro, num keenik mayaaba racmaan kinni Rabbi idini kah yeceeh cakkit yaabá num akke waytek
Toh nummah ayróy raq sinni, toysa Ellecabô maqaane isi nafsih faxe num isi Rabbî fanah madaara yaallay iimaan kee meqe taamáh abittol
Diggah nanu xayi digaalál sin meesisneh, seehadayti kay namma gaba tuysukumem yable ayróy, korosti maganey burtá akkinniyoy edde iyyak
Yalli koros roocitte gibdi siibiyyah siibta malaykal xiibite
Kaadu moominiin roocitte caalih tayyaaqe malaykal xiibite
Kaadu yalli giiruh giirissa malaykay Yallih amrih wacyi oobissaah tayyaaqel xiibite
Kaadu yalli qalaylih qalalta malaykay Yallih amri tagdabuh qalaltal xiibite
Kaadu Yalli isi amri bicissaah tagdube malaykal xiibite
Tangayyi (Baaxo kinnuk) tangayyeh tan ayróy gino inkih edde rabta (toh naharsi baantá fuxsunta ayró kinnuk)
Nammey haytô baantá teetil katayta (toh ummaanim edde tanuwweeh edde ugutta baantá)
Woo ayró koros sorkocobbaxitte meesittah
Ken intiita xixxibittaah taqunxeeh
diggah nee innaa gacsimelem Rabneek lakal nuwwuk addunyâ manoh iyyan
Rumutte lafoofi tikki inneek lakalaa addunyah gacsinnam
Is toysa baxaysitteeh, kasaaritte madaara iyyen
Cagalah is ugut baanatah inki xongoló kinni
Tokkel usun inkih saahira deqsitta baaxol nuwwwuk gaabowan (woh Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk)
Nabiyow Nabii Muusâ xaagi kol yemeetee
Kay Rabbi saytunnoowe daqaaray Tuwa degqsital kaah seece waqdi
Firqawnâ fanah gex, diggah usuk caddok tatrehik kaak axcuk
Kaadu kaak ixxic: dambik saytunnowtaamih sangel maay litoo
Kaadu ku Rabbih inkittinaanee kee kay taaqat edde yanim koh ascassoo kaak meesita num takkemkeh
Edde luk Nabii Muusa kaxxa astá kaa yuybulle
Edde luk firqawni kaa dirabboyseeh cineh
Tohuk lakal iimaanat derre cabeeh sissikuk gexe
tokkel sinam kobxiseeh seeceh
Anu sin Rabbiy inkih daga Raaqa kinniyo iyye
Edde luk Yalli kaa digaaleh ellecaboh iyye maxcoo kee naharsi maxcol
Diggah, firqawnaa kee digaalak kaa geyteemil Yallak meesita marah elle kaskassoowaanam edde tan
Sinaamey ginoh gibduk raqtam siini innaa? hinnak qaranaay?xisoh kaa xisek
Kay amo fayya heeh kaa massoyseh
Kaadu kay bar dattoyseeh, kay laqó ayrô diifut yeyyeeqe
Kaadu baaxó tohih lakal tet fidseh
Teetik lee kee num kee lac akummu haytam teetik yeyyeeqe
Kaadu qaleelá xiikooluh baaxot daabiseh
Sin kee sin lacih tuxxiqih
Tokkel qhiyaamaa kee Kaxxa gibda tamaate waqdi. (woh nammay haytó baanta kinnuk)
Toh Num abba heem edde kassita ayró
Kaadu jaciim deqsitta girá yaybulleen saaku yable marah
Tokkel yallih amrih cinat caddok tatre numuh tugactek
Kaadu akeerak addunyâ mano muxxuse num
Toysa diggah Jaciim deqsitta girá is kay orbeyná
Kaadu Isi Rabbih foocih soolok meesiteeh, isi nafsi umaanê fayxik waase numuh tugactek
Toysa diggah jannat usuk kay orbeyná
Nabiyow Koros qhiyaamak soltima ma waqdiiy axcuk koo esserta
Atu tet ixxigak litom mantu tet keenih warissuh
Tet ixxigá cagalah ku Rabbit taade
Cagalah atu teetik meesita mara meesiise (kade) kinnito
Diggah usun tet yablen ayró, addunya manol carraa kee hinnay saakuk sa tu suge wee marih innah gacca iyyan
Nabii Fooca ribbi heeh derre cabe
Inti mali kaal yemeeteemih
Nabiyow maca koo tiysixxigeeh usuk kok bartah yaniimit dambik saytunnoowa way
Hinnay kassitaah, woo kassit kaa yanfiqe way
Yallal yaamineemik Gaddalita numuh tugactek
Tokkel Atu kaat tafkuneeh, kaat agxitta
Kol tanim matan usuk aaminewaah saytunnoowe waamah
Sissikuk kol yemeete numuh tugactek
Usuk Yallak meesitak. (woh inti mali kinnuk)
Tokkel Atu kaak kalih marat agxitta
Nabiyow atu kah abtenna hinna, diggah is kassiisi
Tokkel faxa num kaa kasah. (Qhuraan kinnuk)
Yalli yeynebe kitoobah addal yan. (woh Qhuraanay lowcal macfuuzul yani kinni)
Is fayya le arac leeh saytunnowteh
Is Taktube malaykah gabat tan
Massakaxxa le meqe malayka
Seehadayti abbarsıimuk maxxu koroosinnu leeh
Yalli macak kaa ginee naharsi adda
Tiffoytak (daacoytak) kaa gineeh ranko rankoh kaa caddoddoyseh
Tohuk lakal gita kaah xabbacoyseh. (woh inâ bagih mawqa kinnik)
Tohuk lakal kaa qidaah edde kaa yaaguqen magaq kaah abé.(woh kabri)
Tohuk lakal Yalli isih faxa waqdi kaa ugsa qhiyaamah ayró
Tonna hinnay nummah (guddunuh) Yalli kaak abá iyyeemiy kaa kah amrise maabinna
Tokkel Seehadayti isi maaqô fanah cubbi luk wagitay
Diggah nanu lee cayxih caxne qamburrek
Tohuk lakal baaxó qanxisiyyah qanxisne
Edde ambó teetit nuysubuke
Kaadu qinabaay, anxeexa.(saqi qayso)
Kaadu zaytuunuvy, tamiira (nakila kinnuk)
Kaadu masnoonay (bustaanway) kiboh tani
Kaadu caxâ mixuu kee caxuwa. (qayso)
Sin kee sin lacah tuxxiq takkê gideh
Tokkel Qaddik tan xongoloy ayti waysissa tamaate waqdi. (qhħiyaamâ xongolo kinnuk)
Too ayró num isi toobokoytak kuda
Kaadu isi inaa kee isi abbak kuda
Kaadu isi barra kee isi xaylok kuda
Woo saaku ummaan num keenik ise duddu haa caagidiy edde agxita le
Too ayró meqe marih foocitte iftah
Tasuuleeh wallittah
Kaadu woo saaku uma marih foocittel obol yan
Ditii kee dité tet buulta
Woo mari usun gibdi korosuvy, gibdi umeyniiti
Ayró xambaqsintaah diifi teetik kata waqdi
Kaadu cutuk luuqa waqdi
Kaadu qaleelá baaxô baguk gexsimtaah foyya takke waqdi
Kaadu tabuni gaali loynamalita waqdi. (idqa gaalá kinnuk)
Kaadu dubaali wariggâ gibdah gaaboysima waqdi
Kaadu badwa giráh innah ursumta wagqdi
Kaadu nafsitte ise celtaamat xibbansinta waqdi. (woh meqe mara meqe marâ luk, uma mara uma marâ luk massoysan waqdi)
Kaadu nuwwih yoogoqen awká esserinta waqdi
Maa dambih qiddinteeh (tiggifimeeh) teetik axcuk
Kaadu aben taamá elle tan kitooba xayyoysintaah, fakkimta waqdi
Kaadu qaran laaracak siibima waqdi
Kaadu jaciim deqsitta girá ursuntaah, hadiidigsinta waqdi
Kaadu jannat Yallak meesita marah xayyoysima waqdi
Too waqdi, nafsi maqaanek hinnay umaanek xayoysitem yaaxigeh
Yalli laqó ifi kak qellita cutuukal xiibite
Gexxa cutuukay isi aroocat qellittal xiibite
Kaadu bari dité baaha waqdil xiibite
Kaadu maaci diifu baaha waqdil xiibite
Diggah qhuraan massâ kaxxa le farmoytih (jibriil kinnuk) maxca
Usuk (Jibriil kinnuk) caylaleeh fayya le arac le, qarshi le rabbih xaqul
Wokkel malayka kaa oggoltaah, wacyil amaanat le
Kaadu sin kataysa (Nabii kinnuk) cabuli akke waamal xiibite
Nummah Nabii jibriil, Yalli kaa edde gine weelot ayro mawqa le gambik baxxaqqa le ikkel kaa yuble
Usuk (Nabii kinnuk) wacyi gudduysiyyal cillaaleli hinna. (cinnaane li/gabâ gibda li)
Kaadu ta Qhuraan Yallih Racmatak xiiriyime sheetaanih maxca hinna
Toysa anke gexxaanaah qhuraan dirabbosseenik
Usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) gersim hinna, Yallak kassiisih insii kee jinnih oobe kitab akke waytek
Siinik cakkii kee iimaanal soolam faxah yan numuh kassiisi
Isin faxxaanam matakka Yallay ginô Rabbih yani faxah akke waytek
Qaran qanxixa waqdi
Kaadu cutuk luuqa waqdi
Kaadu badwa sittal tanfuxxukumeeh, sittat tangale wagqdi
Magooqa fokkaqsimtaah addat sugtem iró ciggilsinta waqdi
Woo waqdi ummaan nafsi yaaxigeh yuysukumem kee udurrusem taamak
Kee seehadaytow maca koo duquurussaah ku Rabbiy cinda lek
Kaay koo gineeh, koo massoyseeh soolo koo yeymeeqe
Isih faxxa hee weelol koo bicseeh gine
Tonna hinnay, a korosey isin nummah gital matanin galtoh ayró dirabbossaana ikkalah
Diggah, sin dacrissa malayka dacayrih siinit tan
Yallih garil massakaxxa le kutbe abta malayka sin taama dacrissam
Isin abba haytaanam taaxigeh
Diggah meqe mari jannatal yalli keenih yeceeh yan niqmatat yan
Kaadu diggah umam aba mari (koros kinnuk) Jaciim deqsitta girah addal yan
Usun galtoh ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) tet culan
Kaadu usun teetik cerrita mara hinnon (inkinnah teetik mayawqan)
Kaadu maca koo tiysixxigeeh galtoh ayró kinnim
Tohuk lakal maca koo tiysixxigeeh, galtoh ayró kinnim
Woh ayroy nafsi nafsih tu edde xiqe waah, woo saaku amri Yalli le
Keexoo kee midaan daggoysa marah finqaa kee digaala tan
Usun Sinaamak keexitan waqdi dudsuta mara keexoo kee midaan
Kaadu usun sinaamah keexeenik hinnay sinaamah miidaanise yakken waqdi daggoysaanah
Woo mari diggah sinni magooqak ugtoonu waanam Mayasmitaanaa
Nabah tan ayrot
Woh sinam ginô Rabbih foocal soltu wayta ayró cisab kee galtoh
Nummah asmatah! umá marih kitab baaxok gubal sijjiin deqsita aracay ceya lel yan
Sijjiin kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh
Kitaabay yunkuttubey gaba kak kaleeni kinni
Woo ayró finqi yan dirabboysa marah
Woh galtoh ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) dirabboysa mara
Kaadu tet dirabbossam matan, ummaan caddok taturliy maggo dambilih yani akke waytek
Ni Qhuraanih aayoota kaal yakriyen waqdi naharsi marih hayyayoonay tunkuttube iyye
Tonna hinnay usuk Yallih kitaabâ ikkal, usun abak sugen uma taamoomi (dambi kinnuk) ken sorkocobaxitte buulteh Qhuraan nummaysaanamak
Wonna hinnay diggah, usun (koros kinnuk) woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) sinni Rabbik rebsimaanaah kaa mayablan
Tohuk lakal diggah, usun jaciim deqsitta girá cula mara kinnon
Tohuk lakal: tah woo girah digaalay isin dirabboysak sugteeni keenik iyyan
Nummah digga luk meqe marih (moominiin kinnuk) kitab jannatak fayya le aracay Qilliyyiin deqsital yan
Maca koo tiysixxigeeh Qilliyyuun kinnim
Woh kitaabay yunkuttubeeh, gaba kak kaleeni kinni
Yalli xayyoyseh yan malayka kaah sumaaqitta
Diggah meqe mari jannatal yalli keenih yeceeh yan niqmatat yan
Sinni Rabbii kee usuk keenih massoyseemî fan Qaraakiy amok wagtan
Niqmatat yaniinim keenik ken foocitteh wir kee nooril taaxige
Liyyuk yan gocoyuy alifut yanik Ken yafqen
Ellecabo kak miski suruylek, woo Niqmatih geytoh qalala mari qalalay
Kaadu tasniim deqsitta darak tu kaat yasgalleen (daragu kinnuk)
Is (tasniim kinnuk) jannatti daray Yalli xayyoyseh yan mari kak yaaqube kinni
Diggah, isi taama yoysomme mari (koros kinnuk), yeemene maral asaaluk sugen addunyal anqasah
Kaadu keenil dardaran (xaqxaqan) waqdi, intiitaa kee miniina sittah casak sugen keenit aban anqasah
Kaadu sinni marâ fanah yandabben waqdi, sattaluk andabbuk sugen moominiinit aben xagaa kee anqasah
Kaadu moominiin yablen waqdi, diggah a mari makkoote mara axcuk sugen
Kaadu ama koros moominiin dacrisa marah anuk ma rubsuminnon
Edde luk Qhiyaamah ayro, yeemene mari korosul yasuuleeh, anqasah
Sinni Rabbii kee usuk keenih massoyseemî fan Qaraakiy amok wagtan jannatal
Koros addunyal abak sugte umaaneenaa kee dambittel galtimtee? Yeey, dudda le galtoh galtimte
Qaran qanxixa waqdi, (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Kaadu isi Rabbih ayti yaceeh, kay amri oggolam cakkik kaal tan
Kaadu baaxó fidsimtaah, farakka itta waqdi
Kaadu tet addat tanim qambissaah, foyyah kak raqta
Kaadu isi Rabbih ayti taceeh, kay amri oggoltam cakkik teetil tan
Kee ta seehadaytow diggah, atu isi Rabbî fanah gexxaah , meqe taama abtek hinnay uma taama abtek, tokkel atu qhiyaamah ayró kaat angoorewettooh abteemil koo galte le
Tokkel Le kitab migdak kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek, (moomintu kinnuk)
Toysa Sahalik tan fokkaaqoh (cisab kinnuk fokkaaqime le sarriinoh)
Kaadu isi marâ fanah wallitak yandabbe.(jannatal)
Kaadu Le kitab kay xiiroonih derrek kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek,(korosta kinnuk)
Toysa Sarriinoh finqaa kee baatih deerise le (seece le)
Urta girá culele tet niqna tammoysuh
Diggah usuk addunyal isi marih addal wallitak suge
Diggah usuk isi Rabbî fanah inkinnah aduure wayu waam yekkele
Yeey, Yalli kaa gacsele! diggah kay Rabbi kaa yabalih sugeeh kay caalat yaaxigeh
Yalli korta ayról ciggiila qasa caawil xiibite
Kaadu bar kee usuk gaaboyseemil (yaskatteemil) xiibite
Kaadu alsal xiibite, noori teetik duuda waqdi
Diggah gurraak gurral (caalataak caalatal) koretton sinaamey
Toysa kah aamine waanam maca loonuv? (koros kinnuk)
Kaadu Qhuraan keenil yankirriyime waqdi, Yallah kah kummaate waanaah kah rammite waanam macalon
Tonna hinnay, koroosite mari rabak lakal ugut yanim dirabboysah
Yalli yaaxigeh usun sinni sorkocobbaxittet qellissi haanam. (qinaadi kee koroosannuk)
Toysa nabiyow ken aytikumus qansarissa digaalál
Kinnih immay yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe sinni galto le akeeral
Yalli mafdagoogi le qaraanal xiibite
Kaadu Yalli isi naqoosa gaaboysu waamah xagana keenih edde hee ayrol xiibite (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Kaadu sumaaqitée kee, elle sumaaqiteynal xiibite
Moominiin elle digaaluh Baaxó dageeh qanxise mari abbarsimeh
Bocot urta gibdi girá elle ursan. (yeemene mara edde carrisoonuh)
Usun woo waqdi tet amol daffeyak yenen
Usun yeemene maral baahaanamal gaabowwu iyyeenih assalaalaquk sugen
Ken kah digaaleenim matan, Yallay mayso leeh fayla lel yeemeneenim akke waytek
Kaay qaranwaa kee baaxô mulki le (kobor le), kaadu Yalli ummaanim yabali kinniih kaak qellittam matan
Diggah moominiinih tan labhaa kee moominiinih tan sayyó girat carrise mari, tohuk lakat atoobee weenik, usun jahaannam digaalá lon. Kaadu ken carrissa digaalá lon
Diggah, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, jannatittey guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa lon, toh kaxxa maffaafa kinni.(asallama)
Diggah, ku Rabbik xibix kaxxam gibdi digaalah yabbixe wagqdi
Diggah usuk ginó suge waytik qimbisaah, ken bayseek geeral ken gacisah
Kaadu usuk dambi cabtiliiy, kacanu le Rabbi moominiinih
Qarshi le Rabbiy nabna le kinni
Isih faxxa haam abe kinni
Nabiyow isi ambiya dirabbosse Qandeh xaagi koo gufee
Firqawnaa kee samuud deqsita mara kinni
Wonna hinnay koroosite mari ku dirabboysiyyat yan
Yalli keenik derrek marot ken yabbixe
Koros kaa elle weelossa inna hinnay, usuk Qhuraanay nabna le kinni
Usuk daccarsime luucih addal yan. (lowcal macfuuz kinnuk)
Yalli qaran kee bar mira cutuktal xiibite
Kaadu maca koo tiysixxigee bar mira cutukti kinnim
Usuk bolok iyya cutuktay, diifut dite boohaysa kinni
Hebeltô nafsi mayan malaykatti dacayrih amol kaak yanih akke waytek
Toysa Seehadayti wagitay cubbusay kak ginniimem
Usuk leey (woh daacoyta kinnuk) sissikuk kaqittak ginniime
Numtin xiiron kee barrah aliilik fanak tawqe
Diggah tohuk kaa gine Rabbi kaa gacsaamah duddali kinni. rabeek lakal
Kassit! Niyaayik lubbittet qellittem fokkaqsimtaah tamballu wayta ayro (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Toysa Usuk cayla maliiy, cateyna mali
Yalli qaraanay qagaa-qagita roblel xiibite
Kaadu baaxoy teetik tawqeemit baqittal xiibite
Diggah Qhuraan yani deedalak baxissa maxcó kinni
Kaadu usuk digir hinna
Diggah usun Nabiih uma malah malsan.(koros kinnuk)
Kaadu wohuk gibdi malah anu keenih malsa cakki yambulleemkeh
Tokkel Nabiyow Ķoros qambaalis, digaalah obtit keenih maqataatakinaay dagoh gide ken qambaalis
Ku Rabbiy kaxxa fayya leh migaq saytunnos
Yallay ginoona gineeh massoyséh migaqa
Kaadu Kaay tu isih elle faxxa hee innal caggudusey gino tirri hee tet celtaah teetik faxximtaamah
Kaadu Kaay anxax qayso baaxok yeyyeeqeh
Tohuk wadir kafteeh data ruma tet abe
Nabiyow ama qhuraan koo akriyisennooh, inkinnah kaa mahawwenta
Yalli faxem akke waytek, diggah usuk tambulleem kee qellittam yaaxigeh.(maxcoo kee taamak)
Kaadu maqaanê gita koh xabbacoysenno
Tokkel Nabiyow isi mara ĶKassis! kassis tu-xiqek
Yallak meesitah yan num kassite lek.(moomintu kinnuk)
Kaadu gibdi umeyni kassitik axxeere-lek.(korosta kinnuk)
Kaay kaxxa girá cula
Tohuk lakal usuk tet addal marabaay, mayanuwwa
Nummah isi nafsi dambik saytunnoyse num naggooweh
Kaadu isi Rabbih migaq cuseeh kaa inkittoyseeh, wonnaluk salaate num
Wonna hinnay isin addunyâ mano muxxussan akeerak
Akeera mano tayseeh, raqtaah waartah
Diggah tama sin kassisnem naharsi kitoobal tan
Toh Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii Muusal obte kitooba
Nabiyow Qhiyaamah ayroy Ghaashiya deqsittah xaagi koo gufeh innaa
Woo ayro Koros foocitte taqunxeeh digaalat
Is addunyal umaaneenâ taamittaah, akeeral girah addal digaalâ taqabta
Niqnah solak tan girá culta
Niqnâ gibdah facta darah leek tet yafqen
Usun maaqó malon uma caxay dariiq deqsitta akke waytek
Is magablussaay, qululuk xiqtam mali
Moominiin foocitte woo ayro saytuniih wir itta
Addunyal abitte isi meqe taama takcineeh ruffu itta akeeral
Fayya iyya jannatih addal
Uma yab kay addal ma taabba
Kay addal gexxa dara tan
Fayya iyya qaraakiy kay addal yan
Kaadu kobboyaayiy maaqabah massoysimteeh daroorî qaxal heeni kay addal tan edde yaaquboonuh
Kaadu Rooruh tan barkumaami (makaddid) kay addal tan
Kaadu fidut tan fidooda kay addal tan
Ta koros gaali elle ginniime inna ma wagittaay ma cubbussaa
Kaadu qaran fayya elle heen inna
Kaadu qaleela elle dabsimteeh, karersimte inna
Kaadu baaxó elle fidsimte inna
Toysa kassis! Nabiyow atu cagalah kassiisé kinnitok
Atu iimaanah ken dirkisa num hinnito
Kinnih immay iimaanat derre cabeeh, koroosite num
Toysa Yalli kaxxa digaalah kaa digaale le
Diggah ken madaara nee fan akkele rabeeniik lakal
Tohuk lakal diggah ken cisab (fokkaaqo) kee galtó nel tan
Yalli maacal xiibite
Kaadu qarafah alsak naharsi tabna baral xiibite
Kaadu ummaan iimik nammay takkem (xibbaan) kee alluudah taniimil xiibite
Kaadu bari yamaate waqdii kee bari dardara waqdil xiibite
Tama hiimiy yalli elle xiibitet kas le numuh kaa xiqtah tan xiiba tanii? yeey, tanih
Ma tablannaa! Nabiyow ku Rabbi Qaad deqsita marak kah abenna
Usun Iram deqsittâ kedoy kaxxa caylaay fayya le xisne luk tene
Is tet celtam Baaxô bagul kak ginniime wayte kedó kinni
Kaadu Nabiyow ku Rabbi Samuud deqsita maray, qaleela ureeh, qarwah haysitek abem ma tablannaa Waad deqsita daqaaral
Kaadu Firqawnay xiikooluy (kadeeday) sinam edde digaala lek kah abe inna
Usun caddok tatre mara baaxol
Edde luk usun tet addal umaane yeymeggee mara
Tokkel Ku Rabbi lafit le digaala keenil caxeeh, oobise
Nabiyow diggah, ku Rabbi kulli seehadaytih taama dacrisaah ken elle galte le
Seehadaytuh tu gactek kay Rabbi kaa yiqiyyireeh (mokkoreeh), kaah yemqeeh kaa hatkise kaa tekkek, yi Rabbi yoh yemqeh iyya
Kaadu kaa yiqiyyireeh, Isi quusi (rizqhi) kaal ceyse kaa tekkek, yi Rabbi yoo yuyqunxeh iyya
Tu elle tanim tonna hinna a seehadaytow, isin qayxixxuh matamqaanaay kaa matassakaxxan
Kaadu tu dagoyti askamiyyah sitta milsissan (ma lallabtan)
Kaadu nagrâ maalu cakki maliinoh gibdi makmoh takmen
Kaadu maalu kaxxa kacanuh kicinton
Tonna hinnay, baaxó kaxxa angoyyih tangayyeeh, bululsimiyyah bululsimta waqdi
Kaadu Nabiyow ku Rabbi yamaateeh, malayka massa massah (saffi saffih) gacta
Kaadu woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) jahannam bahsimah, too ayró seehadayti iimaan kee meqe taamay addunyal cinak suge kassitah, woo kassit kee nadaama mannal tu kaah xiqtaa
Maganey! inni manol maqaané uysukumeh suginniyoy iyya
Woo saaku Yallih digaalah innah tan digaalah, num ma digaala
Kaadu Yallih axawih innah yan axawah num ma yaxaa
Kee satta iyye nafsow. (yallih cusiyyaa kee iimaanat)
Isi Rabbî fanah uduur usuk koh yeceem oggolak akcanuk, usuk ku meqe taama kok oggoleeh, Raabitehik
Toysa Yi naqoosay meqey moominiinih tanih loowot cul
Kaadu keenî luk Yi jannat cul
Ta baaxól xiibita. (makka kinnuk)
Nabiyow atu ta baaxol dabqih yan num kinnito
Kaadu xaltanii kee xaleenimil xiibita
Nummah seehadaytu taqabih ginne addunyal rabba iyyam fan
Usuk (korosta kinnuk) num ise duude waam yakkalee
Hiddootak: maggo maalu Mucammad qadaawatah bayse iyya
Usuk num isi ablewaam yakkalee? yalli kaa yablehik
Namma inti kaah mahanninoo edde yabaluh
Kaadu arrabaa kee namma sokto (arrobta kinnuk) kaah mahanninoo
Kaadu namma gita kaah mabaxxaqisinninoo? (umaanee kee maqaanê gita kinnuk)
Toysa Isi maalu meqe gital yaceemit dook (woh akeerâ gibdaabina kinnuk) macah tatre wee
doô tatur kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh
Woh naqoosannuk moomintoh tan naqso currusaanama
Hinnay qulul edde gibdih yan ayróh addat maaqo yaskameenimi
Xayi qayxixxuy ramad le yaskameenimi
Hinnay tumaliy tussinnah burtat kafe yaskameenimi
Wohuk lakal yeemeneeh, sabril titta farriimeeh, xuwaawal titta farriime marih num yakkeemi
Woh migdi maray moominiinih yani kinni
Kaadu ni aayootal (Qhuraan kinnuk) koroosite mari, usun guri mara
Usun keenil alfimte girah addat yanin
Yalli ayróo kee tet wallaqental xiibite
Kaadu alsál xiibite, teetil katayta waqdi
Kaadu laqól xiibite, is dite kalta waqdi
Kaadu baral xiibite, usuk ditet baaxó buula waqdi
Kaadu qaran kee qaran xise Rabbil xiibite
Kaadu baaxóo kee baaxó fidse Rabbil xiibite
Kaadu nafsii kee nafsi massoyse Rabbil xiibite
Tokkel umaanê gitaa kee maqaane teetik edde tan gita teetih baxxaqiseh
Nummah dambik tet saytunnoyse num naggooweh
Kaadu nummah umaanet tet yubkune num baxaysiteh
Samuud deqgsita mari Yallih farmoyta Nabii Saalic dirabboyseh, usun umaanet caddok tatreenimih sabbatah
Woo marak umaaneh gibdi num kaqteeh alá yusguude waqdi
Tokkel Yallih farmoyti Nabii saalic keenik iyyeh: Yallih alá umaaneh maxaginaay, tet arakih ayró teetih caba
Tokkel kaa dirabboyseeniih, tet yusguudeeniih, ken Rabbi digaalá ken duuduseh aliffi keenil hee ken dambih, Woo digaalá keenil massoyseh.(num keenik ma- raaqinna woo digaalák)
Yalli keenil baaheemik ciggiiliyyah kak meesitâ mali
Yalli baral xiibite, bari ditet baaxó buula waqdi
Kaadu laqól xiibite, is diifut baaxó ifissi hayta waqdi
Kaadu labtii kee saytiyá gine Rabbi isil xiibite
Diggah sin taama sissinih, isin addunyah taamita maraa kee akeerah taamita marah anuk
Tokkel Yalli acuya iyyem yeceeh, Yallak meesite numuh tu-gactek
Kaadu maqaaney (jannat kinnuk) yalli meqe marah massoyse nummaysek
Toysa maqaanê gita kaah xabbacoysenno
Kaadu cillaaliteeh, Yallak gaddalime numuh tu-gactek
Kaadu maqaaney (jannat kinnuk) yalli meqe marah massoyse dirabboysek
Toysa umaanê gita kaal xabbacoysenno
Usuk girat rada waqdi, kay maali tu kaah maxiqa
Diggah tirtô gitay massa le baxxaqisnam nel tan
Kaadu diggah ellecabô dabqii (akeera) kee naharsi dabqil (addunyal) enni ittam inkih nanu lino
Toysa, urtah hadiidigta giral sin meesiisa
Tet cultam matan gibdi umeyna akke waytek
Usuk Nabii dirabboyseeh, iimaanat derre cabe numu
Teetik axxersimele Yallak kaxxam meesita num
Usuk isi maalu yacee numu, ise saytunnoysâ gideh
Kaadu hebltô numuy kay xaqul elle galtima niqmat ley kaah yemqe mayan
Kinnih immay, usuk tamah kah abem fayya iyya Rabbih foocih fayxi kinni
Kaadu usuk sarrah galtot ruffu axceleeh teetit leedele jannat culuwaa saaku
Yalli wallaqental xiibite
Kaadu bari diteh mudugi yakke waqdil xiibite
Nabiyow ku Rabbi koo cabe weeh, koo anqibe weemil
Kaadu diggah, wadirsitto (akeera) naharsittok (addunyak) koh tayseemil
Kaadu ku Rabbi sarroh (akeeral) kulli niqmat koh aceeleeh, kaat leedettooh ruffu kaat axcetto
Nabiyow ku Rabbi qayxixxuh koo geeh, aracay elle orobta koh maabinnaa? abeh
Kaadu kitab kee iimaan kinnim aaxige waa numuy garcit yanih koo geeh, tirri koo mahannaa
Kaadu tu malih koo geeh, koo magaddalisinnaa
Toysa atu toh teexegek, qayxixxu le cakkik ma gutqin
Kaadu kallaci aba numuh tu gactek, kaa ma xiiriyinay meqe qangara kaal gacis
Ku Rabbih niqmatah tugactek, kaat walalaay kaa elle faatit
Nabiyow Alil koh farakka ma hanninoo islaamaninnoo kee nubuwwannul
Kaadu qilsi quuka kok moobisinninoo
Qilsi quukay xiiron kok yiyqilseek
Kaadu fayya koh mahanninoo ku xagar (galab) xago
Toysa diggah gibdaabinâ luk xabca tan
Diggah gibdaabinâ luk xabca tan
Toysa Nabiyow isi caagiidak tamurruqe waqdi, qibaadat taqabaay teetil ingicilliy
Kaadu Ku Rabbih xaqul taniimih sangeelaay kaa kallacit (jannat kinnuk)
Yalli xiibiteh Tiin kee Zaytuun deqsitta namma caxal
Kaadu qaley Tuuri siina deqsittal xiibite
Kaadu a baaxoy saay lel xiibite. (Makka kinnuk)
Nummah seehadaytu tayse weelol ginne
Wohuk lakal usuk yallih amri oggole weeh, kay farmoytit kataate week girak gubi gubah kaa gacsenno
Takkay ikkal, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe wayta galtó le akeeral
Tokkel tahak wadir seehadaytow galtóh ayróh (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk ) dirabboysiyyat maca koo bahtaah
Yalli mekla abba haytaamak meklah yaysi hinnaa? Yeey, kinnih
Nabiyow ku Rabbiy gino gineh yanih migaaqal ikriy
Seehadaytu dabloytak gine Rabbi kinni
Nabiyow! ku Rabbiy kaxxa cinda leh migaaqal ikriy
Usuk kalamat elle yaktuben gurra barse Rabbi kinni
Usuk seehadaytu, aaxaguk suge weem barse Rabbi kinni
Nummah, diggah seehadayti umaanet caddok tatrah
Gaddalitem isik yable waqdi
Diggah madaara ku Rabbî fanah takke Nabiyow
Nabiyow tableh innaa a numuy waasa? (abu jahal kinnuk)
Yallih naqsi (Nabii Mucammad Aasaeiiķo kinnuk) salat aba waqdi
Yoh warisey ta salaatak waasâ num, usuk tirtô bagul yene kaa tekkek
Hinnay Yallak meesil amrisa num yekkek. (wohuk anninnal kaa waasaah)
Nabiyow! Yoh warisey ta sinam waasa num Qhuraan dirabboyseeh, iimaanat derre cabe kaa tekkek
Usuk maaxiginnaa? Diggah Yalli usuk abba haam yable Rabbi kinnim
Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkale inna hinna, usuk tamahak kate wee kaa tekkek gombo kaak gibdi xibixih abbixenno, jahannam girat kaa gasiyak
Kay gombo, dirabley, hoxa leh tani kinni
Tokkel usuk kaa qokla marah deerisay
Nanu girá dacrissa malaykay giral sinam digaaltah seecennok
Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkale inna hinna, Nabiyow kay yab moggolinaay, salaatah kummaataay isi Rabbit xayyow
Diggah Nanu muxxó le baray leylatul Qhadri deqsitat kaa (Qhuraan kinnuk ) oobisne Ramdaanak
Nabiyow leylatul Qhadri bar kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh
Leylatul Qhadri usuk baray muxxó ley, alfi alsak kayrih aysuk raaqa kinni
Tama barat malaykaa kee Jibriiliy ruuc deqsita qaraanak edde obta, sinni Rabbih idnih, ummaan caagidiy Yalli woo liggidih addat mekle luk
Woo bari saayaay nagaaya, maaci maacissi iyyam fanah
Kitab elle oobe marak yahuud kee nasaarak koroosite maraa kee Yallat agleyta haa mari, baxxaqqa geyyi haanam fanah edde sugen koroosannuk kata mara makkinnon
Woh Yallih farmoyta Mucammaday saytun kitooba (Qhuraan kinnuk) yakriye
Woo kitoobah addal nuimmâ xaagittee kee qadaalatal tan amrittey massal tani tan
Mabaxsiminna kitab akah yontocowwime mari (yahuud kee nasaarak), baxxaqqa (Nabii kee Qhuraan kinnuk) keenih temeeteek wadir akke waytek

Kaadu usun kalah kah amrisimeenim malon yallah qibaada caglisak, kaa yaqbudeeniih baatil diinittek inkih islaam diinî fanah keltaanaah salat soolisaanaah zaka yaceenim akke waytek, woh massa le diini kinni
Diggah kitab elle oobe marak koroosittem kee Yallat agleyta haa mari, jahannam girah addal yan, teetil waarak, woo mari usun ginok umaaneh gacta ginó kinnon
Diggah yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe mari, woo mari usun ginok tayse ginó kinnon

Ken galto ken Rabbih xaqul Qhiyaamah ayro qadni deqsitta jannootay guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa, umman kay addal waarak. Yalli meqe taamoomi keenik raabiteh, kaadu usun kaak raabiteenih keenih abe konnaba, woh isi Rabbik meesite marih galto
Baaxó isi angoyyih tasgayyime wagqdi
Kaadu baaxó isi addal taniimiy qilsi tayyaaqe waqdi (rabtem tekkek wohuk kalah tanim tekkek)
Kaadu seehadayti is lem macaay iyya wariggah
Woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró) is isi bagul umaanee kee maqaanek abeenimih xaagu inkih warissah
Diggah ku Rabbi tet amriseemih sabbatah
Woo ayró sinam soolô ballaaqak taduureh fixiixih anuk, ken taamoomi ken yaybulloonuh ken elle galtoonuh
Tokkel maqaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able le
Kaadu umaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able le
Yalli qaduwwî fanah sissikuk yarde faarisiy fuftoh fuf iyyal xiibite
Edde luk xukuuqunut ardi gibdah xinkilliq yayyaaqe faarisil xiibite
Edde luk qaduwwi maaca warara faarisil xiibite usuk garcit (karcit) anuk
Tokkel is abtah tan ardih gibdah sawar (fulle) fuluk hayta
Kaadu woo ardat isi macaxu qaduwwi macaxih addal macsissal xiibite
Diggah, seehadayti isi Rabbih niqmat yangaddi kinni
Kaadu diggah usuk wohul isi nafsil sumaaqita num kinni
Kaadu diggah, usuk maaluh gibdi kacanu le num kinni
Tokkel mayaaxiga innaa! seehadayti kaa qambaltam magooqat enni ittam Yalli yayyaaqu waa waqdi cisab kee galtoh
Kaadu umaanee kee maqaanek alilwat qellisimak sugtem geytimtu waytam mayaaxiga innaa
Diggah ken Rabbi ken kee ken taamoomik woo ayro adda yaaxigi kinni
Al-Qhaariqa: is Qhiyaamah ayroy sinam lubbitte meesissot taagureh migaq kinni
Al-Qhaariqa is macaay
Maca koo tiysixxigee Nabiyow Al- Qhaariqa kinnim
Seehadá fixix kee magga gibdah laahintih (ufuy mali kinnuk) innah edde gacta ayró
Kaadu qaleelá fakfaken suufih (woh illi xagooru) innah edde gacta ayró
Tokkel maqaanê miidaan kak yiqilseeh yan numuh tugactek
Toysa usuk rufto le mano le jannatal
Kaadu miidaan haliffi akak iyye numuh tu gactek
Toysa kay orbeyna haawiya deqsitta girá
Maca koo tiysixxigeeh Nabiyow is kinnim
Is giray gibdi niqna le kinni
Maaluu kee xaylô maggal sittal hiddottaanaah (tirtirissan) Yallih taaqatak sin agxisseh
Rabi sin elelliiy magooqa guffu haytaanam fan
Tonna hinnay sarrah aaxigetton! (rabi lakal)
Kaadu nuimmah sarrah aaxigetton!ellecaboh ayroh digaala siinil obta waqdi
Tonna hinnay isin sin qambaltam asmatah aaxiginnitoonuy edde taniinimik waasimak tenen
Yalli xiibiteh diggah, jaciim deqsitta girá ablettoonumul
Kaadu diggah asmat le mablah tet abletton
Tohuk lakal diggah woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) isin addunyal edde agxitak sugten niqmatak esserimetton
Yalli waktil xiibite
Diggah, seehadayti finqat yaniimil
Yeemene maray meqe taamoomi abeeh, cakkil sitta farriimeeh, sabril sitta farriime koh raaquh
Ummaan camiliy sinam qaybisaah ilqah Fingaa kee baati tan
Maalu gaaboyseeh lowalloowe num
Diggah usuk isi maali isi waarisu waam yakkale addunyal
Caagid usuk elle yakkale inna hinna! Diggah usuk cutama degqsitta giray edde qambisinnaanihim bokookissát gasyime le
nabiyow Maca koo tiysixxigeeh cutamá kinnim
Is Yallih giray ursumteeh hadiidigsinte kinni
Is leh tan niqnah gibdah xagarak sorkocobbaxittel bukku itta
Diggah is keenil alfimteh kaluqqu itte
Usun makaadooday ruubumut tanih addat axawat anuk. (teetik awqe waanâ gidah)
Nabiyow! Ku Rabbi dakanu leh yan marak kah abenna Matablannaa
Yalli Ken uma mala finqa maabinnaa
Kaadu haadá butta buttah keenit ruube itta kataatak
Xeetiy cararte kallak yani keenil qambissa
tokkel ruma yekke caffaa kee cafulay yonkommeh inna ken abe
Qhureyshi deqsittah tan kedo luk sugte qaadáa kee edde sugen saay ma qajjibsittaanaa
Ken qaada gilal yamanâ fanah arhoh aban safar kee cagay shaamâ fanah aban safar kinni meesite kalah.(Yalli keenih yecee amaan kee niqmata)
Toysa a Qarih Rabbi (kaqbá kinnuk) yaqbudoonay qibaadá kaah caglisak
Woh Yallay qululuk ken yoskomeeh, conxok amaan (saay) keenih yecee kinni
Galtoh ayró dirabboysa numih caalat yoh warisey
Woh qayxixxu le cakkik gibdi gutqoh gutqa num kinni
Kaadu usuk tu dagoyta adoobisaanamah sinam milsiisaay isih maaba
Salat abah yan maray (munaafiqhiin kinnuk) yallak galto edde garrise waah gibdi digaalá tan
Usun sinni salat waala maray le waktil kaa abewa
Usun yoobulah sinam sinni tablenkeh meqe taama aba mara kinnon
Kaadu cine waanam, cina mara gacsah, mingiilaay yakmeenih yaaqubeenim kee wohuk kalah taniimik
Diggah Nabiyow nanu kawthar deqsita doray jannatti addal yani koh necee
Tokkel Nabiyow salat kee masgaadá, isi Rabbih caglisak ab
Nabiyow diggah koo kee atu tirtok luk temeetem niqbi num, usuk samad maliiy kulli kayrik yiggiriqqeh
Nabiyow koroosite marak ixxic: kee ta koroseey
Isin taqbuden Numtinwellittee kee sin yallitte maqbuda
Kaadu isin anu aqbudeh an inki yalla yaqbude mara hinniton
Kaadu anu isin taqbudeenim (yallak kalah tanim kinnuk). yaqbude num hinniyo
Kaadu isin anu aqbudeh an inki yalla yaqbude mara hinniton
Isin sinni diini Litoonuuh, anu inni diini liyo
Nabiyow Yallih qokol (cató) kee makki fakim koh Yamaate waqdi
Kaadu seehadá Yallih diinit butta buttah culah table waqdi
Toysa Ku-Rabbi saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu dambi cabti kaal esser,, diggah usuk isil gaca marak gacim (toobat kinnuk) oggolaah qafu aba Rabbi kinnik
Abii lahab namma gaba finqiteh, kaadu usuk finqiteh
Kay maaluy yedderee kee kay xaylo Kaah xiqtem maliiy yallih digaalak tu kaak ma catta
Usuk Ķaxxa ura-le giray hadiidigta Culele
Kaadu kay barray bocó takkuqih tani, girá kaâ luk culele
Tet fillat cambok yan akatay is jahannam giráh addal edde diggalsimta yan
Ixxic nabiyow:usuk Yalla inkittu kinniih, agleyta mali
Yalli cagalah caagiidaa kee faxaanamih magdabah eleelitan Rabbi kinni
Yalli maxalinnaay, Kaa xaltem matan
Kaadu makkinnaay masuginnaay mayan, inkittuy kaa ceelaah kaa qeedaala
Ixxic Nabiyow: maaca gine Rabbi maggansitaah kaa eleelita
Usuk ginni heemih umaanek
Kaadu gibdi dite leh yan barih umaanek kaa maggansita, usuk (bar kinnuk) culah yan waqdi
Ķaadu kuntuubaabil baabah tuf- tufó abtah tan sayyóh umaanek koo maggansita
Kaadu kuuxe waynanli kuuxe waynan aba waqdih umaanek koo maggansita
Ixxic Nabiyow: seehada gine Rabbi maggansita
Seehadah amoytay ken yamlike maggansita.(Yalla kinnuk)
Seehada kah rammittaah, taqbude Yalla maggansita
Waswaseynah yan sheytanay, Yallih cusiyyak garcitan waqdi sinam waswasaah, Yalla cusan waqdi qellitah umaanek koo maggansita
Kaay(sheytan kinnuk)seehadâ sorkocobbaxittet waswasaa kee umaane culsa
Jinni sheytoonaa kee seehadâ sheytoonak tan waswasak
